long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight technical information in patents while suppressing noisy legal language without altering what was drafted by the inventor.

Increased reading speed : 4.7x
Increased information gain : 3.8x

Usage steps: 

1. Open a patent of your choice on google patents
2. In the browser extensions, click on the patent highlighter
3. Click on the highlight button
4. Wait for important information to be highlighted
